description.0: An exquisitely-crafted, standard-model sword forged for the high-ranking officers and flagship captains of Fontaine's old navy.

0.0: After the wielder is healed, ATK will be increased by <cryo>24%</cryo> for 8s. This can be triggered even when the character is not on the field.

1.0: After the wielder is healed, ATK will be increased by <cryo>30%</cryo> for 8s. This can be triggered even when the character is not on the field.

2.0: After the wielder is healed, ATK will be increased by <cryo>36%</cryo> for 8s. This can be triggered even when the character is not on the field.

3.0: After the wielder is healed, ATK will be increased by <cryo>42%</cryo> for 8s. This can be triggered even when the character is not on the field.

4.0: After the wielder is healed, ATK will be increased by <cryo>48%</cryo> for 8s. This can be triggered even when the character is not on the field.
